channel.title: Forum update: New icons for new accounts
channel.description:
New accounts will be assigned a random class portrait avatar. Except for the King ;D
If you want to assign your own, the avatars are just pulled [from our official site](https://www.throneoflies.com) 1/2 way down. Feel free to save it and upload it as your own -- or use your own avatar, of course.
